resources.string: From Android 6.0 Marshmallow onwards the application requires Location permission in order to scan for Bluetooth devices. \n\nThis is because Bluetooth may be used to determine the phone\'s and user\'s location. mini will not use this information in any way.
To use Bluetooth features to communicate APP with your mini you must granted several permissions.
